Perceptor:


"I'M A DECEPTICON AS YOU MAXIMA!!!"hissed the male"An I'm here to 
serve Hydras whose is at time Megatron and Galvatron at time"


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, MaximaSR74@a... wrote:
> Watching the Megatron clone with her crimson gaze, cool & 
calculated... 
> 
>  Then shot a glare at Perceptor. He didn't seem to assist the 
situation any. 
> An animal growl towards him, "Watch your metallic tongue, 
Perceptor. Or you 
> will soon enough find it missing!" 
> 
> Then returning her fiery crimson optics back upon the 
Clone. "Forgive him. He 
> is alike the others. Predacons know little of old Decepticon 
discipline." 
> 
> Looking him over as she walked towards him... "You claim to be 
Megatron.. 
> yet," then started to circle around him in a feline manner, "you 
claim you are 
> not."
> 
> Come back around to the front to face him. "Confusion will not 
work," 
> smirking with a purr, placing her long claw hand units upon her 
hips as the wings 
> flexed a moment.
